title: A 50-Year Mortgage Is A Terrible Idea; But So Is The 30-Year Mortgage
description: The answer isn’t extending the length of mortgages, but finding a better way to finance ownership.
content:
Trump's 50-year mortgage isn't a great idea, but neither is a 30-year mortgage (Photo by Andrew Harnik/Getty Images).
